scripts.test: docker exec -i planit_api_test python -m pytest api -W ignore::DeprecationWarning
scripts.db-save: docker exec -it planit_postgres pg_dump -U planit planit > ./api/resources/database_data.txt
scripts.predb-load: docker exec -i planit_postgres psql -U planit planit -c "DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public;"
scripts.postdb-load: docker exec -i planit_postgres bash -c "cat /home/database_data.txt | psql -U planit planit"
scripts.db-exec: docker exec -it planit_postgres psql -U planit planit
scripts.app-lint: docker exec -t planit_app npm run lint
scripts.app-prettier: docker exec -t planit_app npm run prettier
scripts.api-lint: docker exec -t planit_api python -m flake8 --ignore F401,E402,E501,W503 ./api
scripts.lint: npm run app-lint && npm run api-lint
scripts.prettier: npm run app-prettier && npm run api-prettier
